title: Love Island's Megan Barton-Hanson slays in racy catsuit post 'split'
text:
Halloween costume, Megan? (Picture: Backgrid/Megan Barton Hanson)

Love Island’s Megan Barton-Hanson proves she’s an independent queen in a black lacy catsuit after reportedly ‘breaking up’ from Chelcee Grimes.

The 25-year-old took to Instagram to show off her new lacy bodysuit with a snap off her posing by a door.

She captioned the photo: ‘The baddest P***Y in the room @annsummers #halloweencollection #highjinksorkinks’ along with an emoji of a cat.

The Love Island star, who is also the Director of Pleasure Positivity for Ann Summers, posted the snap after reportedly splitting from girlfriend Chelcee.

Giving Catwoman a run for her money, Megan made sure to make a statement in her sheer get up on Sunday morning.

Our Sunday morning usually consists of lying on the couch watching telly so Megan is already 10 steps ahead of all of us.

Megan proves she is made for red lipstick (Picture: Megan Barton Hanson)

The model and influencer has been making subtle digs about the break up on social media.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Apparently both Chelcee, 27, and her couldn’t find the time to see each other.

Megan recently shared on her Instagram story: ‘Reminder: Relationships are supposed to make you feel good.’

Hours later, Chelcee also shared a cryptic message on her page, quoting a poem.

Is Megan Barton-Hanson subtly shading Chelcee Grimes? (Pictures: Megan Barton-Hanson/Instagram)

It read: ‘Instead of standing by my side/ You tricked me into conceding.

‘Into dimming my own light/ Feeling guilty got succeeding.’

The Love Island star started dating Chelcee last month, following her break-up with Towie’s Demi Sims.

The two dated for a little over a month (Picture: Anthony Devlin/Getty Images)

A music industry insider claimed: ‘They got on really well and enjoyed a brief romance, but decided to call it a day earlier this week.

‘Both were a bit upset about it, but remain pals.’

They added to The Sun that Chelcee is working hard on her music and it’s ‘taking her mind off her love life.’

Megan went public with her relationship with Chelcee last month and Chelcee called her ‘the perfect girl’.

On Instagram stories, Megan wrote: ‘SO proud to call this absolute babe my GIRLFRIEND. Swipe up to watch the full Time to Talk video now!’

Megan Barton-Hanson and Chelcee Grimes were approached by Metro.co.uk for comment.
